official-title.#text:
To prohibit the Internal Revenue Service from hiring new
		  employees to enforce the Federal Government’s invasion into the health care
		  lives of American citizens.

introduced

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

may be filled, by transfer or any other appointment taking effect on or
